bioghist.p: Beatrice Lamb (1904-1997) graduated from Bryn Mawr College. She received a master's degree from Columbia University focusing on India studies. She also trained in New York's Clarence White School of Photography. She was a photographer and also authored several books about her travels in India.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of correspondence and other papers relating to Lamb's activities as the editor of United Nations News and as a member of the League of Women Voters. The collection also includes correspondence, research materials, and photos concerning her books, especially India, A World in Transition (1963).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
